attr.title: TINAMP
attr.desc:
TINAMP - This Is Not A Music player is an audio book player application meant to play DRM free audio books.
It remembers listening positions, sorts alpha numerically, supports different play speeds, has a sleep timer and equalizer presets.
It features a simplistic 16x4 ASCII character UI that adapts to fill the screen as much as possible. It comes with a free English and German audiobook from LibriVox.
attr.desc_md:
TINAMP - **T**his **I**s **N**ot **A** **M**usic player is an audio book player application meant to play DRM free audio books.
It remembers listening positions, sorts alpha numerically, supports different play speeds, has a sleep timer and equalizer presets.
It features a simplistic 16x4 ASCII character UI that adapts to fill the screen as much as possible. It comes with a free English and German audiobook from [LibriVox](https://librivox.org/).
attr.inst: Install the application and place your audio books inside the existing ports application audiobooks folder. For more folder options see notes section.
attr.inst_md: Install the application and place your audio books inside the existing ports application audiobooks folder. For more folder options see notes section.
